original_text: But if ye had known what this meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice, ye would not have condemned the guiltless.
korean_text: 나는 자비를 원하고 제사를 원하지 아니하노라 하신 뜻을 너희가 알았더라면 무죄한 자를 정죄하지 아니하였으리라

sentences.original_text: But if ye had known what this meaneth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 이것이 무엇을 의미하는지 알았더라면

sentences.original_text: ye would not have condemned the guiltless
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 죄 없는 자를 정죄하지 않았으리라
